title: Equity Is Impossible & God Doesn't Play Favorites | Daily Best of October 5 | Rick & Bubba
description:
When Christians encounter tragedy and hardship, how they respond should point people to Christ. That's the reason for suffering in this world. In the wake of Bubba's amazing cancer recovery, we ask how Christians should react, in good times and bad. In politics, Vice President Kamala Harris continues to push "equity" as the answer, while in reality, it's impossible and just poorly-veiled Communism. In sports, Aaron Judge breaks the American League home run record. And the movie "Bros" was complete flop and we can't imagine why?!?!
